title: 5-22-17 Heather Givans, Lynette Jensen, and Q&A with with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Heather Givans of CrimsonTATE has a fun loving style! Her latest fabric line is called Literary and I’m really interested in how she developed her patterns to showcase the fabric. She is also a shop owner and I really want to visit her store!www.crimsontate.com
---------
If you have been quilting for awhile, you will recognize the brand name Thimbleberries and the designer behind that is Lynette Jensen. She was one of the first pattern designers to partner with a fabric company to build a distinctive look. When I first started quilting it was one of the first names I got to know.  Lynette shows us how to use our quilts as part of our lifestyle, to incorporate them into our homes in all sorts of ways.  We are going to have fun learning what Lynette is up to now! http://thimbleberries.com/blog/
-----
Q&A + a Bit More this week with Pat!
